title: Ep 108: Love Yourself
itunes:title: Ep 108: Love Yourself
itunes:subtitle: This week Kate nurses a cold and starts journaling, and Doree finishes her move and takes a relaxing bath in her new home. Then they dig into the practice of cultivating self-love and compassion, and hear from listeners about their own acts of self-lov...
description:
This week Kate nurses a cold and starts journaling, and Doree finishes her move and takes a relaxing bath in her new home. Then they dig into the practice of cultivating self-love and compassion, and hear from listeners about their own acts of self-love.


Use code LOVE at the Forever35 Merch Store for 10% of your purchase through 11:59 PM ET on February 15th!  


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:


  • CHARLOTTE TILBURY - Charlotte Tilbury is shoppable directly from CharlotteTilbury.com!
  • HONEY - Use code FOREVER at joinhoney.com .
  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.
  • PRETTY LITTER - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • TALKSPACE - Get your first week free of Talkspace when you visit talkspace.com use promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
